Summary Note:
The RM first met Larsen Thomsen Jespersen at a wine tasting event in Copenhagen. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Larsen Thomsen Jespersen is a 34 year old Ship Broker from Denmark.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Larsen Thomsen Jespersen has been happily married to Olivia since 2017. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2008, Larsen finished his secondary school education at Frederikshavn Gymnasium.
Larsen earned his degree from Zealand Institute of Business and Technology in 2014.
On top of that he then attended Roskilde University, where he graduated in 2018.
Occupation History:
Larsen Thomsen Jespersen is a 34 year old and comes from Denmark.
At Norden A/S, Larsen Thomsen Jespersen held the position of Ship Broker from 2014 till now, developing essential skills in the field.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 580000 DKK from his earnings at all companies.
He has flat located in Gladsaxe, worth 807000 DKK.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns townhouse in Vejle worth 1570000 DKK.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 53740000 DKK from his late grandfather, a renowned Neurosurgeon, in 2015.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
